DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim clinical trial compare change trunk fat mass , assess Double Energy X-ray Absorptiometry ( DEXA ) 26 week treatment insulin detemir insulin NPH ( Neutral Protamine Hagedorn ) ( combine insulin aspart main meal ) overweight obese subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Change Fat Distribution Overweight Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes After Insulin Treatment
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes treat 2 3 dos insulin ( one must premix ) least 3 month prior inclusion trial Glycosylated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) 7.011.0 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27.540 kg/m^2 Treatment oral antidiabetic drug ( OADs ) last 6 month except metformin ( subject currently treat metformin within interval 1000 2550 mg daily may include trial . The dose remain unchanged period 2 month prior randomisation expect remain unchanged throughout trial period ) Use approve weight lower pharmacotherapy ( e.g . orlistat , sibutramin , rimonabant ) obesity induce drug treatment ( e.g . corticosteroid , Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , tricyclic antidepressant , atypical antipsychotic ) Previous plan surgical treatment obesity Total daily insulin dose high equal 2 IU/kg Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment within last six month Receipt investigational drug within 1 month prior trial Cardiac disease define accord New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class III IV , unstable angina pectoris and/or myocardial infarction within last 6 month previous selection
